roleset.name: expect

example.name: just transitive
example.text: They initially planned a transaction that included about $250m in equity
example.arg: a transaction that included about $250m in equity

example.name: thing planned as infinitive
example.text: The group plans *trace=group* to put in even more money in equity
example.arg: to put in even more money in equity

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Then , if the stocks fell sharply , he planned to begin buying them aggressively , on the theory that the companies that insure against property damage and accidents will have to raise rates eventually to compensate for the claims they will pay to earthquake victims and victims of last month 's Hurricane Hugo .
example.arg: on the theory that the companies that insure against property damage and accidents will have to raise rates eventually to compensate for the claims they will pay to earthquake victims and victims of last month 's Hurricane Hugo

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Costco from the United States began planning its first Taiwan store in 1995 , and the French wholesale outlet Casino arrived in 1999 .

example.name: ARG1
example.text: Over the past few years he has held two Taiwanese exhibitions of his modern ink paintings , and a third is planned for October at the National Museum of History .
example.arg: at the National Museum of History

example.name: with beneficiary
example.text: Isn't it true that you were so worked up that framing Mr. Laff for this crime was [the least]-4 that you planned [*T*-4]for him?''

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: The market rebound Monday followed weekend assurances from Mr. Darman that the administration has other plans to win the cut , which is alive and well .
example.arg: to win the cut , which is alive and well .

example.name: With beneficiary
example.text: We also rest peacefully on the fact that she is also His, and His plan for her is perfect

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: The City Council Democrats unveiled their plan to redistrict the municipality based on 2010 U.S. Census numbers.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: So %uh anyway we-1 're really doing our utmost PRO-1 to do some creative planning to reverse that trend for next year
example.arg: to reverse that trend for next year.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: He has a flair for design and is exacting in his planning of our installations.

roleset.note:
PLAN-V NOTES: (from plan.01-v)
PLAN-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry plan.01 Corresponds to VN entry wish-62. (from plan.01-n)
PLANNING-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry plan.01 Corresponds to VN entry wish-62. (from planning.01-n)
